qas.question: What system is common to Western Romance?
What is the Catalan verbal system common to?

context: The <a0_0>Catalan verbal system<a0_0/> is basically common to <a2_0>all Western Romance<a2_0/>, except that most dialects have replaced the <a1_0>synthetic indicative perfect<a1_0/> with a periphrastic form of anar ("to go") + infinitive.
